rev.desc.rev.desc: Rename RAD of cm.auto.open.task as change.auto.open.task for chagne enablement
Clean up the $L.task before re-init it to hold new task.
QCCR69608 - When we approve the Emergency Change ticket which is in ECAB Approval, automatic tasks are opened in Change.Approver user and able to work on the task.
Changes:
Panel: call.view
Change:Added the variable "$L.bg.action" to the ackground Action parameterPanel: set.vars
Change:Added the following expression:if ($L.open.bg=true) then ($L.bg.action="add") else ($L.bg.action=NULL)
Remove references to cm3tprofile
Add parent to list of parameters passed to the cm.open process.
panel: set.vars
change exit.normal from call.open.process to apply.default.template
new Panel: apply default.template in type: Template.apply.default.template
Table Name: filename($L.task)
File: $L.task
exit.normal: call.open.process
Added a condition in check.view to not go into display if the change is coming from the Service Catalog.
updated the check.more.member panel so that the condition for the exit to do.have.more.member will also have the following added on:
" and $L.cntr in $L.auto.each.ci=true"
add query.file for js call
significant changes to accommodate ci group
Removed extraneous panels.

descript.descript: Rename RAD of cm.auto.open.task as change.auto.open.task for chagne enablement
Clean up the $L.task before re-init it to hold new task.
QCCR69608 - When we approve the Emergency Change ticket which is in ECAB Approval, automatic tasks are opened in Change.Approver user and able to work on the task.
Changes:
Panel: call.view
Change:Added the variable "$L.bg.action" to the ackground Action parameterPanel: set.vars
Change:Added the following expression:if ($L.open.bg=true) then ($L.bg.action="add") else ($L.bg.action=NULL)Remove references to cm3tprofile
Add parent to list of parameters passed to the cm.open process.
panel: set.vars
change exit.normal from call.open.process to apply.default.template
new Panel: apply default.template in type: Template.apply.default.template
Table Name: filename($L.task)
File: $L.task
exit.normal: call.open.process
Added a condition in check.view to not go into display if the change is coming from the Service Catalog.
updated the check.more.member panel so that the condition for the exit to do.have.more.member will also have the following added on:
" and $L.cntr in $L.auto.each.ci=true"
add query.file for js call
significant changes to accommodate ci group
Removed extraneous panels.
